# Data & Variable types

---

## Variables
--

- any text that is not enclosed in "" or ''
- without brackets at the end, e.g. test()
- not predefined words

```{r variables}
"number"
number = 5
number
"text"
text <- 'R is amazing'
print(text)
```

---

## Data types
--

```{r data_types, eval = F}
input
"text"
1.5
20L
TRUE
FALSE
Sys.Date()
Sys.time()
0 / 0
```

---
## Data types cont.

```{r data_types_comments, eval = F}
input # variable (not an actual data type)
"text" # character
1.5 # numeric
20L # integer
TRUE #boolean
```
```{r data_types_comments_eval}
Sys.Date() # Date
Sys.time() # POSIXct POSIXlt
NA
0 / 0 # this is bad idea
```

---
## Data structures
- what a variable can be?



--
- vector

--
- matrix

--
- list

--
- data frame

---

## Vectors

```{r vector}
c(2, 5)
c(8, 25, 3.14, -4)
c('R', 'S')
c(25, T, 'a') # T is the same as TRUE
2:6
```

---

## Matrices

```{r matrix}
matrix(c(2, 5))
matrix(c(8, 25, 3.14, -4), nrow = 2)
matrix(c('R', 'S', 'C', 'Py', 'C', 'J'), ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)
```

---

## Matrices cont.

```{r matrix_cont}
matrix(c('R', 5, 'C', NA, Sys.Date() , T), nrow = 3, ncol = 2)
```

---

## Data frames

```{r data_frame}
input = data.frame(wage = c(1:3), gender = c("male", "female", NA))
input
rownames(input)
colnames(input)
```

---

## Data frames cont.

```{r data_frames_question}
output = data.frame(wage = c(1 , 2, NA, Sys.time(), 'not avaliable'))
```

--

```{r data_frames_answer}
output
```

---

## Lists

```{r list}
list(125, "R is good")
list(onetyone = 11, zwoelf = "12")
list(a = c(1:5))
```

---

## Lists cont.

```{r lists_cont}
list(WTH = data.frame(NUM = 1:2, STR = c('a', 'b')),
     OMG = matrix(1:12, ncol = 4))
```

# Arithmetic & logic operators

---

## Arithmetic operators

```{r arithmetics}
2 + 7
x = 2; y = 7
x + y
y - x
y^x
y/x
```

---

## Arithmetics operators cont

```{r arithmetics_cont}
x = 2; y = 7
y %% x
y %/% x
```

---

## Arithmetic functions

```{r arithmetics_functions}
x = 1:10
sqrt(x) # log(), exp(), sin(), ...
sum(x)
mean(x) # median(), quantile(), ...
```

---

## Arithmetic functions cont.

```{r arithmetics_functions_cont}
summary(x) # can be used on data.frame and many other types 
```

---

## Sequences

```{r sequences}
x = 6; y = 15
x:y
seq(x, y, by = 2.5)
seq_len(y)
seq_along(x:y)
rep(y, x)
```

---

## Boolean
```{r boolean}
TRUE & FALSE
c(T, F) & T
c(T, F) && T
T | F
!F
```

---

## Comparison
```{r comparison}
"a" == "b"
2 != 5
2 %in% 1:5
3.985 < 7
5.61 >= 5.61
```
